game.name: Schizophrenia
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Schizophrenia is a game where you have to not go crazy and get out of the bunker. Use all the items you can find to survive. Remember. The main thing is not to go crazy. And further. Don't make loud noises. They can hear you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Schizophrenia is a game where you have to not go crazy and get out of the bunker. Use all the items you can find to survive. Remember. The main thing is not to go crazy. And further. Don't make loud noises. They can hear you.
